      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addError(String from, String to, Double error) 
      void empty() 
      String getAssignedLabel(String correct)
      Given a correct label, returns probabilistically a label that can be assigned by a worker with this confusion matrix
      Set<String> getCategoryNames() 
      Double getErrorRate(String from, String to) 
      void normalize()
      Makes the matrix to be row-stochastic: In other words, for a given "from" category, if we sum the errors across all the "to" categories, we get 1.0
      void normalizeLaplacean()
      Makes the matrix to be row-stochastic: In other words, for a given "from" category, if we sum the errors across all the "to" categories, we get 1.0.
      void setErrorRate(String from, String to, Double cost)

    • Method Detail

      • getCategoryNames

        public Set<String> getCategoryNames()

      • empty

        public void empty()

      • normalize

        public void normalize()
        Makes the matrix to be row-stochastic: In other words, for a given "from" category, if we sum the errors across all the "to" categories, we get 1.0

      • normalizeLaplacean

        public void normalizeLaplacean()
        Makes the matrix to be row-stochastic: In other words, for a given "from" category, if we sum the errors across all the "to" categories, we get 1.0. We use Laplace smoothing

      • addError

        public void addError(String from,
            String to,

      • getAssignedLabel

        public String getAssignedLabel(String correct)
        Given a correct label, returns probabilistically a label that can be assigned by a worker with this confusion matrix
        Parameters:
        correct - The correct category for the object
        Returns:
        A possible assigned label for the object, assigned probabilistically according to the confusion matrix values
